title: FS: Many T206 Players in 1906 Red Roses RPPC
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: FS: Many T206 Players in 1906 Red Roses RPPC
posts.post_content:
$250 net to me.

1906 RPPC of the Lancaster Red Roses. There is a print version that is more common, this is one of two RPPCs I have seen. I haven't lined up face ids, but the 1906 team roster reads likes the T206 set: Cy Barger, Bill Chappelle, Rube Dessau, Patsy Dougherty, Tom Downey, Bull Durham, Ed Lennox, and Chief Meyers.
